events.message: I ordered a product last week, but I want to return it because it is not what I expected and I would like a refund.
The issue has been classified under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
A customer service representative has been assigned to handle the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your order. I am here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can proceed quickly?
My order number is 123456789, and I want to return it because the color is different than shown on the website.
We will initiate the refund once we receive the returned item. I will send you the return label by email shortly.
Thank you for your quick response and for providing the return label. I appreciate your help with this.
We have received your returned item and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
We are closing this case now, but please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
You will receive a satisfaction survey shortly. We would appreciate your feedback on our service.
